attributes.action: Help for long covid neurological sufferers, with urgent hospital treatment.
attributes.additional_details: The reason I would like more help from the government is because of the lack of treatments and hospital availability for us. The symptoms we have are. Burning sensations. Muscle aches bone pains. Body spasms. Internal vibrations. Shooting nerve pains. Head pains. Inability to stay mobile for long. Many more symptoms too. We are in a serious health crisis situation. Unless you died or spent time on a ventilator you are not seen as critical. We are critical.
attributes.background: To please understand the suffering of neurological symptoms from long covid. Our GPS are not trained to be aware of the neurological symptoms To be referred to a hospital rather then a covid clinic that has no power or treatment options. The symptoms are like living in internal hell.
